uploadBackground.title: Upload your Room background
uploadBackground.description: Drag & Drop file here or click button

editPositions.tooltip: Drag & Drop users to the right places

templateLinks.title: Drag & Drop circles to the right places / Click on link to edit

monetization.title: Room monetization
monetization.userPay: User pay you to use this room

cancelCreate.title: Cancel Room creation?
cancelCreate.text: All your settings will be lost

savePublishedChanges.title: Save changes?
savePublishedChanges.text: The Room may be already used by people

createRoomDialog.title: Create and publish Room?
createRoomDialog.text: The Room will instantly become available for the platform users

confirmDeleteRoom.title: Delete Room {{roomName}}?
confirmDeleteRoom.text: The Room will be deleted from Ruume library and will become unavailable for all users who purchased it or added to the list of their rooms

publishRoomDialog.title: Publish Room {{templateName}}?
publishRoomDialog.text: The Room will instantly become available to the platform users

revokeRoomDialog.title: Revoke publication?
revokeRoomDialog.text: The Room will be removed from Ruume library, but will stay in the list of My Rooms of those users who currently have it.

backgrounds.emptyMedias: Nothing medias. Please click upload to create new media

confirmDeleteCategory.title: Delete Category "{{categoryName}}"?
confirmDeleteCategory.text: The Category will be deleted from Ruume library

confirmDeleteMedia.title: Delete Media
confirmDeleteMedia.text: The Media will be deleted from Ruume library
